game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: An ancient artifact has been stolen from the town museum. Your task is to find the thief and recover the artifact.

task.description: Visit the town museum and gather clues about the thief.
Use the clues to find the thief's hideout and recover the artifact.
Test the stolen artifact using a sensitive test to determine its authenticity.
报告发现的结果， including the thief's identity and any potential evidence against them.

task.objective: Promote the recovery of the artifact
task.description: Use the recovered artifact to promote tourism in the town and bring attention to the missing artifact.
